thread.title: The NikeLab Essentials 2017 Collection Is As Minimal And Timeless As Sportswear Can Be
thread.title_full: The NikeLab Essentials 2017 Collection Is As Minimal And Timeless As Sportswear Can Be

author: Jesse Bernard
title: The NikeLab Essentials 2017 Collection Is As Minimal And Timeless As Sportswear Can Be
text:
Visit the original post to see all 25 images from this gallery. 
Following last yearâ€™s drop of the NikeLab Essentials collection, the brand has returned with a SS17 update. Merging minimal design with maximum performance, the new NikeLab Essentials collection is built for free movement.
Super-lightweight construction is combined with advanced fabrics and fits to produce a range of high-performance garments with a bold colour palette. The outer layers are water-repellent to keep you going in most weather conditions, while sweat-wicking Dri-FIT material helps to regulate your temperature.
The outerwear takes performance and street-level to the next level by marrying the two. Water-repellent soft shell anoraks come in black and white with multiple zip vents for a futuristic sports-luxe look, while the classic bomber is modified with bonded pockets. A pair of half-zip tops mix water-repellent fabric with Dri-FIT as layering pieces, and the hoodies feature stretch fabric, two-way zippers and the sideways NikeLab Essentials branding.
The NikeLab Essentials SS17 collection is Available now at Nike and select retailers:
Shop Now In other fashion related news, Gucci releases its vintage logo sweatshirt in an exclusive pink colorway.
